lead_paragraph: Low energy costs and weak consumption put a lid on price growth, government data showed on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Japanese Inflation Is Flat in Year to February
headline.main: Japanese Inflation Is Flat in Year to February

snippet: Low energy costs and weak consumption put a lid on price growth, government data showed on Friday.
abstract: Japan's consumer inflation remained flat at 1.1 percent in year to February, unchanged from January.
